text: @aajtak Sahi me u r totally pappu... U can't understand the situation. pm Modi sir is not a scientist Or pharmacist.. Ok.. But any way.. Kamiya nikalne ke alwa aaj tak kuch or aaya hai... Tumhe... How can U say?. That PM modi is silent in the case of COVID19..
